title: Who can stop him now? Sepp Kuss tightens grip at Vuelta a España in Jumbo-Visma romp
content:
The elimination of Remco Evenepoel clears the way for a Jumbo-Visma podium sweep in Madrid. The only question now is if Sepp Kuss can hold on.

Read the full article at Who can stop him now? Sepp Kuss tightens grip at Vuelta a España in Jumbo-Visma romp on Velo.
author: ahood
